languages.text: {n}Дознаватель прокашливается и чуть слышно добавляет:{/n} "Достопочтенные {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g} благословлены самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}. Несмотря на свой... особый облик, навигаторы благородных Домов хранят силу и власть не меньшую, чем у вашей династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель прокашливается и чуть слышно добавляет:{/n} "Достопочтенные {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g} благословлены самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}. Несмотря на свой... особый облик, Навигаторы благородных домов хранят силу и власть не меньшую, чем у вашей династии".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

Несмотря на свой... особый облик, навигаторы благородных Домов хранят силу и власть не меньшую, чем у вашей династии".

Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix aclara su garganta y añade con tranquilidad,{/n} «El mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} bendijo la gloriosa {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. A pesar de su... peculiar apariencia, el poder y autoridad de los navegantes de las casas nobles no dista de los de su dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix aclara su garganta y añade con tranquilidad,{/n} «El mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} bendijo la gloriosa {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. A pesar de su... peculiar apariencia, el poder y autoridad de los navegantes de las casas nobles no dista de los de su dinastía».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Die angesehene {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} wurde vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst gesegnet. Trotz ihres ... einzigartigen Aussehens besitzen die Navigatoren der Adelshäuser Macht und Autorität, die denen Eurer Dynastie in nichts nachstehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Die angesehene {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} wurde vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst gesegnet. Trotz ihres ... einzigartigen Aussehens besitzen die Navigatoren der Adelshäuser Macht und Autorität, die denen Eurer Dynastie in nichts nachstehen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la voix, avant d'ajouter doucement :{/n} « La vénérable {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} est bénie par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} en personne. Malgré leur apparence... unique, les navigateurs des maisons nobles ont un pouvoir et une autorité équivalents à ceux de votre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la voix, avant d'ajouter doucement :{/n} « La vénérable {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} est bénie par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} en personne. Malgré leur apparence... unique, les navigateurs des maisons nobles ont un pouvoir et une autorité équivalents à ceux de votre dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，轻声补充道。{/n}“受人尊敬的{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}得到了{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的赐福。尽管他们……外表独特，但导航宗族的导航者拥有着相当程度的权力与威望，并不亚于你的王朝成员。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，轻声补充道。{/n}“受人尊敬的{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}得到了{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的赐福。尽管他们……外表独特，但导航宗族的导航者拥有着相当程度的权力与威望，并不亚于你的王朝成员。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをして、静かに付け加える。{/n}「尊敬される{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}その人の祝福を受けている。彼らは…独特な姿をしているが、貴族出身の航宙士は、あなたの王朝の航宙士に劣らない権力と権威を持っています」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをして、囁くように付け加える。{/n}「尊敬される{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}その人の祝福を受けている。彼らは…独特な姿をしているが、貴族出身の航宙士は、あなたの王朝の航宙士に劣らない権力と権威を持っているんだ」
{n}ハインリックスは咳払いをして、静かに付け加える。{/n}「尊敬される{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}その人の祝福を受けている。彼らは…独特な姿をしているが、貴族出身の航宙士は、あなたの王朝の航宙士に劣らない権力と権威を持っています」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, boğazını temizleyip kibarca ekliyor.{/n} "Pek değerli {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri tarafından kutsanmıştır. Normale kıyasla... Eşsiz görünümlerine rağmen soylu Hanelerin Rotacılarındaki güç ve yetki, hanedanınızdakilerden kesinlikle aşağı kalır değildir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and adds softly,{/n} "The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} are blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. Despite their... unique appearance, the Navigators of the noble Houses wield power and authority no less significant than those of your dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, boğazını temizleyip kibarca ekliyor:{/n} "Pek değerli {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobiliteler{/g}, bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} tarafından kutsanmıştır. Normale kıyasla... Eşsiz görünümlerine rağmen soylu Hanelerin Rotacılarındaki güç ve yetki, hanedanınızdakilerden kesinlikle aşağı kalır değildir."
